channel.title: Im not trying to be mean, but
channel.description:
I'm seeing a lot of people posting here that are completely clueless with Java. I don't mean like bugs with your server. I mean some of you don't even know what a compiler is and that's sad. Please learn the Java basics [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,134771.0.html]HERE[/url] and then ask questions. I'm sick of helping people that don't know anything about Java.
This will be probably get locked and I'll get warned (I hope not) but please just do it.

item.title: Im not trying to be mean, but
item.dc:creator: @Kitno Kitno
item.description:
@Kitno wrote:

I like helping people, though. And I don’t mind if their problems are dumb… but some people even ask “HOW DO I MAKE A SERVER!!!” If they actually read rules before they posted they would know to search before asking. There are over 20 tutorials on that.

Read full topic
item.source: Im not trying to be mean, but

item.title: Im not trying to be mean, but
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

[center]That’s what this section is for.
Development.
If you don’t like it, don’t use it.[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Im not trying to be mean, but
item.dc:creator: @Kitno Kitno
item.description:
@Kitno wrote:

I know I did. But I even looked for tuts when I first started. I didnt ask questions for every little thing.

Read full topic
